title: The Biggest Madre of Them All
Episode #1.14
description: Hoping to attract truck drivers to Bert's place, Rufus persuades Bert's wife Claudia to post as "Frisco Fritzi," a gum-chewing, sharp-tongued waitress.

title: The Importance of Being Hairy
description: Rufus goes to a lot of trouble to surprise Bert with a toupee for his birthday, but Bert flatly refuses to wear it until Claudia persuades him to try it -- and, to her horror, he becomes a changed man.

title: Big Tom Gets Married
description: Rufus is wrangled into proposing to Gertie on behalf of the tongue-tied Big Tom, and Gertie's three protective brothers then hold Rufus responsible for getting the boozing Big Tom to the wedding sober.

title: Win, Place, and Kill
description: Rufus and Bert frantically try to hid $50,000 from two thugs chasing a bookie who used Bert's place as his headquarters.

title: The Best Ship of All Is Friendship
Two's a Crowd
description: After a quarrel, Bert buys Rufus's share of the partnership, He then has nightmares about how his buddy will survive without him, only to discover that Rufus doesn't miss him at all.

title: Claudia Sows a Few
description: Claudia sets out to beautify the countryside by sowing flower seed capsules, but the police think she is dumping drugs.

title: Fireman, Save My Diner
description: Rufus and Bert try to become volunteer firemen, but Bert has trouble passing the main test: making friends with the firehouse dog.

title: Is This Trip Necessary
description: Dusty old prospector Sierra Jake enjoys a hearty breakfast at the diner and pays his bill with a ragged treasure map he claims leads to a pirate's bounty. Bert laughs it off, but Rufus is convinced and sets off to discover the fortune, arousing Bert's suspicions.

title: No Orchids for the Diner
description: Rufus and Bert learn that a famous jet-set restaurant editor lives nearby, so they set out to win her endorsement of the diner.
